message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a great deal. I'm willing to start with an offer of $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still a bit short on budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $140. I think the product is worth it, and I'm willing to make a compromise. How about we meet at $137.50?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider that?
